attributes.action: not allow the use of cloned animals for food production
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
cloned animals have a higher rate of death and disease and malformations this should raise serious questions of food safety,
also the research for cloning has not been done so we have no idea what the impact could be be in the long term, 
the rush to approve clone farming is being driven from the U.S Government which is keen to boost the profits of American companies.
We should BAN this now before it even gets started.
